name: Night of the Lanternmites
description:
You are trapped in a dark cave and have to escape using the only light source you have: deadly insects called lanternmites. Strategically place these lantermites and avoid all of the obstacles to reach the end.

Control:

A and D to move

Space to jump

Mouse movement and click to control and place down the lanternmites

S to kill all lantermites on screen

Make sure to play in fullscreen.

Credits:

Thanks jwiese, netgfx, and bevouliin.com for making the art,

Shaolin Dub for making the music,

Jalastram, EVRetro, MLaudio, and cabled_mess for the sound effects,

and NotEuclid for the idea.
